title: When is the best time to purchase an iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: The very best time to purchase a new iPhone is when you actually need a new phone. But if you just want a new phone, the best time is as soon as a new model becomes available. Here’s why: If you are looking for all the latest features, then buying as soon as a new model is introduced is the way to go.If you are looking to save money, the previous model usually is reduced by $100.

Honestly, it’s when you need it. Apple usually releases phones in the Sept-October time frame. You can get deals on existing iPhones during the late summer as inventory is being cleared out. If you want the newest phone, it’s best to wait until the fall when the phone finally comes out.
